name: AMERICAN COUNCIL FOR AN ENERGY-EFFICIENT ECONOMY
description: A nonprofit, 501(c)(3) organization dedicated to advancing energy efficiency
sampleDescriptions: Funding for energy efficiency programs in the Department of Energy and Environmental Protection Agency.
